players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.

Bob: "I think it's important that we all share any information we have about ourselves or anything unusual we may have noticed. This could help us identify the mafia and keep our group safe."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information we have about ourselves or anything unusual we may have noticed during the night. This could help us identify the mafia and keep our group safe."
